title: Membership Application Approved Event
description: Published when a coach approves a membership application

eventId.description: Unique identifier for this event instance

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the event occurred

causationId.description: Causation ID of the operation that triggered this event

applicationId.description: Unique identifier for the membership application

athleteId.description: User ID of the athlete whose application was approved

clubId.description: Club the athlete was approved to join

coachId.description: Coach who approved the application and will be assigned to the athlete

reviewedBy.description: User ID of the person who reviewed (may be different from assigned coach)
